channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned chair, 2nd February
item.description:
This chair was abandoned on the evening of 30th of December 2025 in the middle of the street and later on in front of the property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hichisson Road, Nunhead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More Rough Sleeping..., 2nd February
item.description:
New makeshift tent on top of grasses. Red one still there. Is rough sleeping OK in Butterfield Green given it's used by children and families?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Allen Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large tv left lent against fence, 2nd February
item.description:
Tv has been there all weekend and still there today
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Seymour Villas, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Another Fly tipping incident on BusheyHill Road, 2nd February
item.description:
Once again, the residents at 70 Bushey Hill Road have left lots of old furniture and household waste out on the street - there is stuff out there on most days, I can't believe how much rubbish they must have in the house. I must have reported this about 10 times in the last 2 years - further action must be taken, and I will be contacting the police if this continues.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Bushey Hill Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous holes in road, 2nd February
item.description:
Large and deep holes. Increasing in size. Been like this for roughly 1 month
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chislehurst Road, Bickley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Various quantities of dog fouling on this road, 2nd February
item.description:
Various quantities of dog fouling on this road, about 6 different piles across this side of the road on the pavement and close to people’s homes (was not able to upload all 6 images)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holmcroft Way, Southborough, Greater London

item.title: Rubbish..., 2nd February
item.description:
Dumped stuff. Here for many weeks.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Spenser Grove, Hackney, London

item.title: 2 x double beds Fly Tipped, 2nd February
item.description:
2 x double beds; double mattress; bath; child's car seat; box of flowers etc. has been dumped next to the large blue recycling bins at the back of 59 - 73 John Wilson Street. ** I reported bed & mattress last Sunday (25th) and then again last Wednesday (28th) when another bed was dumped too. Over the weekend (1st Feb) a bath, chair and boxes was dumped as well. ** I thought fly tipping was a Council priority......

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): John Wilson Street, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Couple of potholes on the Northbound carriageway, 2nd February
item.description:
My bike hit a couple of big potholes here on my way home tonight, on the approach to the zebra crossing. Almost came off my bike. Please fix asap before someone gets seriously hurt. What3words location is approximately: https://w3w.co/tolls.blaze.clues
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Canonbury Road, Islington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A dark coloured wooden bedhead and some other bits of wooden furniture have been dumped on the pavement, 2nd February
item.description:
A broken wooden bedhead and some other bits of furniture have been dumped on the pavement near the junction of The Limes Avenue and Palmers Road. They are outside the first or second house on The Limes Avenue and are obstructing the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 84, The Limes Avenue, New Southgate, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The Roundabout now a hole, 2nd February
item.description:
Previously a roundabout, now a large hole in the road. Been like this for months and getting worse
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackbrook Lane, Bickley, Greater London

item.title: Old wooden chair and bags of rubbish dumped on the pavement, 2nd February
item.description:
An old wooden dining chair and a number of bags of rubbish (some already broken open) have been dumped on the pavement outside The Limes Close. Children walk along here to the school and this rubbish is causing an obstruction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72, The Limes Avenue, New Southgate, Greater London

item.title: Outside the Rising Sun pub, 2nd February
item.description:

item.title: The path drain is blocked, 2nd February
item.description:
The path drain on the East side of the lower lake near the North end of Kelsey Park is blocked with leaves, so the water does not drain away and overflows across the path. The path is muddy and wet and slippery in cold weather. It has been blocked for months. Please can the drains be cleared.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelsey Park Avenue, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 8788946 - Pavement defect outside communal door, 2nd February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albany Street, Fitzrovia, Greater London
